sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-chart style="width:100%;height: 800px;" :options="chartOption" autoresize />
</template>

<script>
import { getWordCut } from "../../../api/job";

export default {
  name: 'PlotBarChart',
  data() {
    return {
      chartOption: {},
      maskImage: new Image(),
      data: [],
      words: null
    };
  },

  async mounted() {
    await getWordCut().then(res => {
      console.log(res.data.data, 111111)
      this.words = res.data.data
    })

    this.loadData()
    this.maskImage.src = require('@/assets/zl.png')
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.chartOption = this.buildChartOption();
    },500)
  },
  methods: {
    loadData() {
      for (var name in this.words) {
        this.data.push({
          name: name,
          value: Math.sqrt(this.words[name])
        })
      }
      console.log(this.data, 222222)
    },
    buildChartOption() {
      const option = {
        tooltip: {},
        series: [{
          maskImage: this.maskImage,
          type: 'wordCloud',
          gridSize: 2,
          sizeRange: [10, 50],
          rotationRange: [-90, 90],
          shape: 'pentagon',
          width: 900,
          height: 900,
          drawOutOfBound: false,
          textStyle: {
            normal: {
              textBorderColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.3)',
              textBorderWidth: 1,
              color: () => {
                return 'rgb(' + [
                  Math.round(Math.random() * 160),
                  Math.round(Math.random() * 160),
                  Math.round(Math.random() * 160)
                ].join(',') + ')';
              }
            },
            emphasis: {
              fontSize: 20,
              shadowBlur: 10,
              shadowColor: 'rgba(255,255,255, .1)'
            }
          },
          data: this.data
        }]
      };

      return option;
    },
  }
};
</script>
